enWisdom: The lifespan [of a person] is [made up of] a specific number of breaths

Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّيْلَ وَالنَّهَارَ مُسْرِعَانِ فِي هَدْمِ الْأَعْمَارِ
enWisdom: Indeed the night and day are quick in razing the lifetimes

Wisdom: السَّاعَاتُ تَخْتَرِمُ الْأَعْمَارَ وَتُدْنِي مِنَ الْبَوَارِ
enWisdom: The [passing of] hours diminishes lifetimes and bring [one] closer to annihilation

Wisdom: إِنَّ غَايَةً تَنْقُصُهَا اللَّحْظَةُ وَتَهْدِمُهَا السَّاعَةُ لَحَرِيَّةٌ بِقِصَرِ الْمُدَّةِ
enWisdom: Verily the life that is being shortened every moment and being dismantled every hour must be regarded as very short
How can one be pleased with a lifetime that is diminished by [the passing of] hours?!
In every moment there is loss
Every day is driving towards its morrow

Wisdom: مَا انْقَضَتْ [مَا نَقَصَتْ‏] سَاعَةٌ مِنْ دَهْرِكَ إِلَّا بِقِطْعَةٍ مِنْ عُمُرِكَ
enWisdom: An hour of your time does not pass but that it cuts away a portion of your lifespan

Wisdom: مَا أَسْرَعَ السَّاعَاتِ فِي الْأَيَّامِ وَأَسْرَعَ الْأَيَّامَ فِي الشُّهُورِ وَأَسْرَعَ الشُّهُورَ فِي السَّنَةِ وَأَسْرَعَ السَّنَةَ فِي الْعُمُرِ
enWisdom: How quick the hours pass in the day and how fast the days pass in the month and how quick the months pass in the year and how fast the years pass in the lifetime!
With the passing of hours, lifetimes perish

Wisdom: لَا بَقَاءَ لِلْأَعْمَارِ مَعَ تَعَاقُبِ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ
enWisdom: With the progression of days and nights, nothing remains of the lifetimes

Wisdom: لَا تَنْفَعُ الْعُدَّةُ إِذَا مَا انْقَضَتِ الْمُدَّةُ
enWisdom: Preparation does not benefit when the time has elapsed
